Articles.Content: Hello, how do I start to make mods? I got an idea, that it would be fun to change kerbal model to a human or something, but how do I start?
Look into the games files and tweak things here and there. Well, that's how I started modding.

On 8/10/2023 at 3:25 AM, Kekse said:

Hello, how do I start to make mods? I got an idea, that it would be fun to change kerbal model to a human or something, but how do I start?

Welcome! Like @Watermel00ni also started by tweaking stuff in the game data folder, without adding extra textures, such as making larger fuel tanks or better engines. I later picked up Kopernicus planet making. It’s fun and easy and there are plenty of tutorials and softwares.
